title: India's daily COVID-19 deaths near record, calls for nationwide lockdown mount
content:
1. India's daily COVID-19 deaths near record, calls for nationwide lockdown mount  Reuters India
  2. India Sees Deadliest Day Of Pandemic With COVID-19 Deaths Topping 4000  NPR
  3. India sets record for single-day COVID-19 death toll  CBS News
  4. India COVID-19 reports a record of more than 4,000 COVID-19 deaths  Business Insider
  5. Covid-19: India records over 4000 deaths for the second straight day | Oneindia News  Oneindia News

localize.title: インドのCOVID-19による一日の死亡者数が記録に迫り、全国的なロックダウンを求める声が高まる
印度每日COVID-19死亡人数接近记录，呼吁全国范围内的封锁。
印度每日COVID-19死亡人數接近記錄，呼籲全國範圍內的封鎖。
